enneagram_info.name: Enneagram Personality System
enneagram_info.description: The nine personality types with wings, arrows, and instinctual variants
enneagram_info.source: Traditional Enneagram wisdom with modern psychological insights

1.name: The Perfectionist
1.core_motivation: To be good, right, perfect, and to improve everything
1.core_desire: To be good, to have integrity, to be balanced
1.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you do what is right

9.name: 1w9 - The Idealist
9.description: More withdrawn, objective, and principled. Seeks to create a perfect world through systematic improvement.

2.name: 1w2 - The Advocate
2.description: More interpersonal, helpful, and critical. Seeks to improve others and society through direct action.

integration.name: Integration to Seven
integration.description: When healthy, Ones become more spontaneous, joyful, and accepting of imperfection. They embrace life's possibilities.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Four
disintegration.description: When stressed, Ones become moody, irrational, and self-pitying. They may become depressed and withdrawn.

healthy.1: The Wise Realist - Discerning, noble, and morally heroic
healthy.2: The Reasonable Person - Rational, principled, and purposeful
healthy.3: The Principled Teacher - Orderly, well-organized, and self-disciplined

average.4: The Idealistic Reformer - Dissatisfied with reality, becoming critical
average.5: The Orderly Person - Highly controlled, rigid, and perfectionistic
average.6: The Judgmental Perfectionist - Critical of others, impatient, and inflexible

unhealthy.7: The Intolerant Misanthrope - Highly critical, intolerant, and inflexible
unhealthy.8: The Obsessive Hypocrite - Obsessive about imperfection in others
unhealthy.9: The Punitive Avenger - Severe depression, nervous breakdowns, suicide attempts

self_preservation.name: SP One - Anxiety
self_preservation.description: Focuses on personal security and getting things right in their environment

social.name: SO One - Inadaptability
social.description: Focuses on being the perfect member of groups and society

sexual.name: SX One - Jealousy
sexual.description: Focuses on perfecting intimate relationships and being the ideal partner

growth_recommendations: Practice accepting 'good enough' rather than perfect
Learn to express anger directly rather than through criticism
Develop spontaneity and playfulness
Practice self-compassion and forgiveness
Embrace the beauty of imperfection

2.name: The Helper
2.core_motivation: To feel loved and needed and to express their feelings for others
2.core_fear: Being unloved or unwanted for themselves alone
2.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you are loved by others and are close to them

1.name: 2w1 - The Servant
1.description: More critical, controlling, and people-focused. Serves others but with high standards.

3.name: 2w3 - The Host/Hostess
3.description: More ambitious, image-conscious, and seductive. Helps others to gain recognition.

integration.name: Integration to Four
integration.description: When healthy, Twos become more self-aware, creative, and emotionally honest about their own needs.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Eight
disintegration.description: When stressed, Twos become demanding, controlling, and manipulative. They may become aggressive.

healthy.1: The Disinterested Altruist - Unconditionally loving, humble, and giving
healthy.2: The Caring Person - Empathetic, compassionate, and feeling for others
healthy.3: The Supportive Friend - Supportive, encouraging, and helpful

average.4: The Effusive Friend - Wants to be closer to others, intrusive
average.5: The Possessive Friend - Increasingly possessive and controlling
average.6: The Self-Important Saint - Self-important and overbearing

unhealthy.7: The Self-Deceptive Manipulator - Manipulative and self-deceptive
unhealthy.8: The Coercive Dominator - Dominating and coercive
unhealthy.9: The Psychosomatic Victim - Chronic health problems, victimization

self_preservation.name: SP Two - Privilege
self_preservation.description: Focuses on being special and privileged in relationships

social.name: SO Two - Ambition
social.description: Focuses on being important and influential in groups

sexual.name: SX Two - Seduction
sexual.description: Focuses on being irresistible and attractive to specific individuals

growth_recommendations: Learn to recognize and express your own needs
Practice receiving help from others
Develop healthy boundaries in relationships
Cultivate self-love independent of others' approval
Practice saying no without guilt

3.name: The Achiever
3.core_motivation: To feel valuable and worthwhile, to be affirmed, to distinguish themselves from others
3.core_fear: Being worthless or without value apart from their achievements
3.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you are successful and others think well of you

2.name: 3w2 - The Charmer
2.description: More interpersonal, helpful, and people-focused. Achieves through relationships.

4.name: 3w4 - The Professional
4.description: More introverted, artistic, and pretentious. Achieves through creative expression.

integration.name: Integration to Six
integration.description: When healthy, Threes become more cooperative, committed, and loyal to something greater than themselves.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Nine
disintegration.description: When stressed, Threes become apathetic, listless, and disengaged. They may become depressed.

healthy.1: The Outstanding Person - Self-accepting, authentic, and inspiring
healthy.2: The Adaptable Person - Self-assured, energetic, and competent
healthy.3: The Outstanding Paragon - Ambitious, competent, and energetic

average.4: The Competitive Status-Seeker - Highly concerned with performance and image
average.5: The Image-Conscious Pragmatist - Calculating and losing touch with feelings
average.6: The Self-Promoting Narcissist - Grandiose, exhibitionistic, and arrogant

unhealthy.7: The Unprincipled Opportunist - Unscrupulous, exploitative, and opportunistic
unhealthy.8: The Malicious Deceiver - Devious, deceptive, and vindictive
unhealthy.9: The Monomaniacal Psychopath - Relentless, obsessive, and potentially dangerous

self_preservation.name: SP Three - Security
self_preservation.description: Focuses on material security and being a good, normal person

social.name: SO Three - Prestige
social.description: Focuses on social status, prestige, and being admired by groups

sexual.name: SX Three - Charisma
sexual.description: Focuses on being attractive and desirable to specific individuals

growth_recommendations: Learn to value yourself apart from achievements
Practice being authentic rather than performing
Slow down and connect with your feelings
Develop genuine relationships beyond networking
Embrace failure as a learning opportunity

4.name: The Individualist
4.core_motivation: To find themselves and their significance, to create an identity from their inner experience
4.core_fear: Having no identity or personal significance
4.core_desire: To find themselves and their significance
4.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you are true to yourself

3.name: 4w3 - The Aristocrat
3.description: More ambitious, extroverted, and image-conscious. Seeks to be unique and successful.

5.name: 4w5 - The Bohemian
5.description: More withdrawn, intellectual, and unconventional. Seeks to be unique and authentic.

integration.name: Integration to One
integration.description: When healthy, Fours become more objective, principled, and self-disciplined. They focus on others.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Two
disintegration.description: When stressed, Fours become clingy, dependent, and manipulative. They seek others to rescue them.

self_preservation.name: SP Four - Tenacity
self_preservation.description: Focuses on enduring suffering and being strong despite pain

social.name: SO Four - Shame
social.description: Focuses on being different from and superior to others

sexual.name: SX Four - Competition
sexual.description: Focuses on being more special and intense than others

growth_recommendations: Practice gratitude for what you have
Focus on others rather than yourself
Develop discipline and follow through
Accept ordinary moments as valuable
Build stable routines and commitments

5.name: The Investigator
5.core_motivation: To be capable and competent, to understand the environment, to have everything figured out
5.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you have mastered something

4.name: 5w4 - The Iconoclast
4.description: More creative, intuitive, and expressive. Seeks knowledge through personal experience.

6.name: 5w6 - The Problem Solver
6.description: More practical, loyal, and anxious. Seeks knowledge for security and problem-solving.

integration.name: Integration to Eight
integration.description: When healthy, Fives become more confident, decisive, and action-oriented. They engage with the world.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Seven
disintegration.description: When stressed, Fives become scattered, impulsive, and hyperactive. They may become manic.

self_preservation.name: SP Five - Castle
self_preservation.description: Focuses on creating a safe, private space with minimal needs

social.name: SO Five - Totem
social.description: Focuses on finding their place and role in groups through expertise

sexual.name: SX Five - Confidence
sexual.description: Focuses on finding the ideal partner or connection through shared interests

growth_recommendations: Practice engaging with others regularly
Take action on your ideas and insights
Share your knowledge and expertise
Develop emotional intelligence
Trust your body and instincts

6.name: The Loyalist
6.core_motivation: To have security and support, to have guidance, to test the attitudes of others
6.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you do what you are supposed to do

5.name: 6w5 - The Defender
5.description: More withdrawn, intense, and independent. Seeks security through knowledge and preparation.

7.name: 6w7 - The Buddy
7.description: More outgoing, playful, and optimistic. Seeks security through relationships and fun.

integration.name: Integration to Nine
integration.description: When healthy, Sixes become more relaxed, optimistic, and trusting. They find inner peace.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Three
disintegration.description: When stressed, Sixes become competitive, arrogant, and aggressive. They may become workaholics.

self_preservation.name: SP Six - Warmth
self_preservation.description: Focuses on creating security through alliances and being likeable

social.name: SO Six - Duty
social.description: Focuses on being a good member of groups and following rules

sexual.name: SX Six - Strength
sexual.description: Focuses on being strong and intimidating to ward off threats

growth_recommendations: Learn to trust your own inner guidance
Practice making decisions without seeking approval
Develop confidence in your abilities
Question authority when appropriate
Cultivate faith and optimism

7.name: The Enthusiast
7.core_motivation: To maintain their happiness and keep themselves occupied and engaged
7.core_fear: Being trapped, deprived, or in pain
7.core_desire: To maintain their happiness and satisfaction
7.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you take care of yourself and get what you need

6.name: 7w6 - The Entertainer
6.description: More responsible, loyal, and anxious. Seeks adventure within secure relationships.

8.name: 7w8 - The Realist
8.description: More aggressive, materialistic, and workaholic. Seeks adventure through power and control.

integration.name: Integration to Five
integration.description: When healthy, Sevens become more focused, profound, and fascinated by knowledge and understanding.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to One
disintegration.description: When stressed, Sevens become perfectionistic, critical, and impatient. They become rigid.

self_preservation.name: SP Seven - Keepers of the Castle
self_preservation.description: Focuses on creating networks and opportunities for security and pleasure

social.name: SO Seven - Sacrifice
social.description: Focuses on being of service to others and making the world better

sexual.name: SX Seven - Suggestibility
sexual.description: Focuses on being fascinated and inspired by people and experiences

growth_recommendations: Practice staying with difficult emotions
Develop depth and follow through on commitments
Learn to be present rather than planning ahead
Cultivate gratitude for what you have
Practice moderation and self-discipline

8.name: The Challenger
8.core_motivation: To be self-reliant and in control of their own life and destiny
8.core_fear: Being controlled or vulnerable to others
8.core_desire: To be self-reliant and in control
8.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if you are strong and in control of your situation

7.name: 8w7 - The Maverick
7.description: More enthusiastic, aggressive, and materialistic. Seeks control through adventure and excess.

9.name: 8w9 - The Bear
9.description: More withdrawn, stubborn, and complacent. Seeks control through steady pressure.

integration.name: Integration to Two
integration.description: When healthy, Eights become more caring, helpful, and generous. They use their power to help others.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Five
disintegration.description: When stressed, Eights become secretive, withdrawn, and paranoid. They isolate themselves.

self_preservation.name: SP Eight - Satisfaction
self_preservation.description: Focuses on getting what they need and want for survival and comfort

social.name: SO Eight - Solidarity
social.description: Focuses on protecting and fighting for their group or cause

sexual.name: SX Eight - Possession
sexual.description: Focuses on possessing and controlling their intimate relationships

growth_recommendations: Practice vulnerability and asking for help
Learn to control your intensity and anger
Develop empathy and consideration for others
Practice patience and listening
Use your power to serve rather than dominate

9.name: The Peacemaker
9.core_motivation: To maintain their inner and outer peace and to avoid conflict
9.core_fear: Loss of connection and fragmentation of their world
9.core_desire: To have inner and outer peace
9.basic_proposition: You are good or okay if those around you are good or okay

8.name: 9w8 - The Referee
8.description: More assertive, energetic, and confrontational. Seeks peace through strength.

1.name: 9w1 - The Dreamer
1.description: More idealistic, critical, and perfectionistic. Seeks peace through order.

integration.name: Integration to Three
integration.description: When healthy, Nines become more focused, energetic, and goal-oriented. They take action.

disintegration.name: Disintegration to Six
disintegration.description: When stressed, Nines become anxious, worried, and dependent. They seek external support.

self_preservation.name: SP Nine - Appetite
self_preservation.description: Focuses on personal comfort, routines, and physical well-being

social.name: SO Nine - Participation
social.description: Focuses on belonging to groups and being included

sexual.name: SX Nine - Union
sexual.description: Focuses on merging with others and losing themselves in relationships

growth_recommendations: Practice taking action on your own priorities
Learn to express your opinions and preferences
Develop your own agenda rather than going along
Practice saying no when appropriate
Cultivate self-awareness and personal goals

body.name: Body Center
body.description: Body types are concerned with control, resistance, and autonomy

heart.name: Heart Center
heart.description: Heart types are concerned with identity, image, and being valued

head.name: Head Center
head.description: Head types are concerned with security, guidance, and having support

assessment_questions.question: When facing a problem, I tend to:

options.1: Look for the right way to solve it
options.2: Think about how it affects others
options.3: Focus on achieving the best outcome
options.4: Consider what it means about me
options.6: Seek advice or support from others
options.7: Look for multiple solutions and options
options.8: Take direct action to fix it
